title: How to Make Red Wine Hot Chocolate

steps.headline: Mix the unsweetened cocoa powder, sugar, and salt
Stir in the tablespoons of milk, depending on how thick you want it.
Pour in the red wine of your choice
Combine all the ingredients in the pot
Bring the mixture in the pot to a boil
Remove from heat once it's at your desired temperature and once all the ingredients are melted and stirred in
Pour into a mug and enjoy!

text: Get a small pot  Mix the unsweetened cocoa powder, sugar, and salt  Stir in the tablespoons of milk, depending on how thick you want it.  Pour in the red wine of your choice  Combine all the ingredients in the pot  Bring the mixture in the pot to a boil  Remove from heat once it's at your desired temperature and once all the ingredients are melted and stirred in  Pour into a mug and enjoy!  Finished.
